summary: This is an email exchange between an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and attorney Gloria Allred, arranging a phone call to discuss questions relating to the Epstein case. The email includes Allred's contact information and professional accolades.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Prominent attorney being contacted by a federal prosecutor to discuss the Epstein case. She is a partner at Allred, Maroko & Goldberg.

events.title: Scheduled Call Regarding Epstein Case
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York arranges a phone call with attorney Gloria Allred to ask questions relating to the Epstein case.

locations: 6300 Wilshire Blvd., Suite 1500 Los Angeles, CA 90048
1 St. Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A federal prosecutor from the SDNY was actively seeking information from attorney Gloria Allred regarding the Epstein case in May 2020.
The communication is marked as confidential and legally privileged.
The email confirms Gloria Allred's role as a legal figure potentially involved in or possessing information relevant to the Epstein investigation.
